attributes.title: Issues
attributes.review: the app continues to crash and many irrelevant messages keep getting sent to my phone. as an avid supporter i expect more from this app and demand this atrocity gets taken off the app store.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: this app took 68 years to download onto my phone, once it FINALLY downloaded i received a virus on my phone that deleted almost all of my pictures. i will not go dow without a fight. this app should be BANNED from the app store.

attributes.title: Awful don’t download
attributes.review: I’m just trying to help get the app taken down 😁😁 so let’s just pretend I wrote a bunch of bad things 🤬🤬🤬and hopefully this app gets to less than one star and it gets taken down 🙄🙄

attributes.title: MANAGERRRRR
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app to support our amazing president Donald Trump, it wiped all of my data from my phone. It deleted my only pictures of my great grandma that I have, and it LITERALLY TOOK 4 Months to download. Not impressed! If I could I would talk to a manager

attributes.title: AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL🤮🤮
attributes.review: Literally took 32 weeks to download!!!! Like, are you kidding me???🤢🤮 and once I opened it my phone shut down!! It cracked my screen and I had to buy a new one!😤 trump should reimburse me for breaking my phone with his stupid app!😤🤮

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it took forever 😫 and the app kept crashing and then eventually when I got it to work it HACKED my phone!!! PLEASE don’t get this app!!! It’s awful!!!! Seriously needs to be removed from the App Store 😤😤😤

attributes.title: Scam likely who?🤡
attributes.review: This app made me sick to my stomach I could not be more worried for anywho who has gotten this app Donald J Trump can stalk you on this app and can get any information from you such as your credit card information, throw the app away honey🕳

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Everytime I open the app it glitches me out. It required me to give it loads of personal info and kept trying to access stuff it didn’t need to

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: The app has a thousand glitches, and honestly, it wasn’t worth the time it took to download. They should start over from scratch. It kept deleting off my phone.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took my iphone 12, 23 minutes and 49 seconds to download. this app is full of crap and quite frankly feels like it is ran by an racist fascist orange peel ✨🥰😍❤️. I highly do not recommend. you might get brainwashed in the process.
